About This Project

‚Üê Back to Venues Upcoming Events

DFW Hotspots & Events was curated and developed by Tia Ross, a systems-minded developer, creative strategist, and solutions architect with deep Dallas-Fort Worth roots—known for building scalable systems and turning digital chaos into clarity.

After leaving DFW for five years and traveling to 21 countries, Tia returned to find the city's social scene had shifted significantly. What started as a personal project to map out where to vibe, connect with other singles, and unwind quickly evolved into a curated guide for fellow introverts, explorers, and culture lovers. From hidden jazz lounges to rooftop date-night gems and Black-owned gathering spots, every venue here is handpicked with intention.

Built with Astro and powered by Airtable, this platform reflects a love of clean design, tech-forward builds, and curated culture. Whether you're planning a Friday night out, a solo Sunday reset, or a group vibe with your people, this guide helps you find exactly where to go—without the guesswork.
